property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, company_id, dept_id, code, name, display_name, title, job, is_company, customer, supplier, parent_id, commercial_partner_id, user_id, country_id, region, zip, street, phone, mobile, fax, email, website, signup_type, signup_code, signup_expiration, tax_code, legal_person, register_fund, business_socpe, ref, brief, active, note, create_date, create_uid, write_uid, write_date FROM cm_partner WHERE id ={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, job, parent_id, phone, mobile, ref, create_date, create_uid, write_uid, write_date FROM cm_partner WHERE parent_id ={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT U.ID USERID ,U.CODE,U.ACCOUNT,U.NAME UNAME,U.STATUS STATUS FROM CM_USER U WHERE U.ACCOUNT={uname} AND U.PASSWD={pwd:str}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, NAME, PASSWORD FROM user WHERE NAME = {name}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT U.ID USERID,U.ACCOUNT,U.NAME UNAME,O.ID OID,O.higher_id CID,O.NAME ONAME,CASE WHEN U.STATUS=1 AND O.STATUS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END STATUS FROM CM_USER U,CM_ORG O WHERE U.ORGID=O.ID AND U.ID={userId}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT cr.ID RID ,cr.CODE,cr.NAME FROM cm_role cr,cm_user_role_rel cur WHERE cr.ID =cur.ROLE_ID AND cur.USER_ID={userId}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT M.Code ID,M.HIGHER_ID PID,M.NAME TEXT,cm_resource.URI URL,M.Layer ,M.ICON_URI,M.Detail,M.HINT FROM CM_MENU M ,cm_resource ,cm_user_role_rel ,cm_role_resource_rel WHERE cm_user_role_rel.ROLE_ID=cm_role_resource_rel.ROLE_ID AND m.RESOURCE_ID=cm_role_resource_rel.RESOURCE_ID AND cm_resource.ID=m.RESOURCE_ID AND M.STATUS='1' AND cm_resource.STATUS='1' AND cm_user_role_rel.USER_ID={userId} ORDER BY HIGHER_ID,CODE,SEQ

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, code, name, type, status, note FROM cm_dict

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, code, name, type, status, note FROM cm_dict where id={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, code, dict_id, dict_line_id, name, value, seq, path, layer, detail, status, note FROM cm_dict_line

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id, code, dict_id, dict_line_id, name, value, seq, path, layer, detail, status, note FROM cm_dict_line where id ={id} ORDER BY seq

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT line.name,line.value,line.seq,line.status FROM cm_dict_line line INNER JOIN cm_dict dict ON line.dict_id=dict.id AND dict.code={d} ORDER BY seq

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT KEY_ID,MAX_VAL,CIRCLE,ORG_ID,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_KEY_GENERATOR WHERE KEY_ID={keyid} AND ORG_ID={orgid}

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,Account,NAME,ORGID,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_User

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,SHORTFOR,HIGHER_ID,ORG_TYPE,DIRECTOR,ADDRESS,TEL,FAX,ZIPCODE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM cm_org

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,IS_EXT,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM cm_role

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_ROLE where id not in (select ROLE_ID from cm_user_role_rel t where t.USER_ID={userid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_ROLE where id in (select ROLE_ID from cm_user_role_rel t where t.USER_ID={userid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME FROM CM_RESOURCE where id not in (select RESOURCE_ID from CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL t where t.ROLE_ID={roleid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME FROM CM_RESOURCE where id in (select RESOURCE_ID from CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL t where t.ROLE_ID={roleid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME,URI,TYPE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_RESOURCE

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, CODE, NAME, HIGHER_ID, SEQ, RESOURCE_ID, ICON_URI, HINT, Path, Layer, Detail, STATUS, DESCRIPTIOIN FROM cm_menu

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT id, company_id, dept_id, code, name, display_name, title, job, is_company, customer, supplier, parent_id, commercial_partner_id, user_id, country_id, region, zip, street, phone, mobile, fax, email, website, signup_type, signup_code, signup_expiration, tax_code, legal_person, register_fund, business_socpe, ref, brief, active, note, create_date, create_uid, write_uid, write_date FROM cm_partner where parent_id is null or parent_id = '') AS partner

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, Code, Name, partner_id, product_code, product_name, product_qty, product_uom, Link_Man, telephone, Signed_Date, Start_Date, End_Date,Description FROM cm_compact

property.value: SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,SHORTFOR,HIGHER_ID,ORG_TYPE,DIRECTOR,ADDRESS,TEL,FAX,ZIPCODE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM cm_org

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, CODE, NAME, HIGHER_ID, SEQ, RESOURCE_ID, ICON_URI, HINT, Path, Layer, Detail, STATUS, DESCRIPTIOIN FROM cm_menu

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME,URI,TYPE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM CM_RESOURCE

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,IS_EXT,STATUS,DESCRIPTION FROM cm_role

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME FROM CM_RESOURCE where id not in (select RESOURCE_ID from CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL t where t.ROLE_ID={roleid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,NAME FROM CM_RESOURCE where id in (select RESOURCE_ID from CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL t where t.ROLE_ID={roleid} )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, Code, Name, partner_id, product_code, product_name, product_qty, product_uom, Link_Man, telephone, Signed_Date, Start_Date, End_Date,Description FROM cm_compact

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO cm_partner (id, company_id, dept_id, code, name, display_name, title, job, is_company, customer, supplier, parent_id, commercial_partner_id, user_id, country_id, region, zip, street, phone, mobile, fax, email, website, signup_type, signup_code, signup_expiration, tax_code, legal_person, register_fund, business_socpe, ref, brief, active, note, create_date, create_uid, write_uid, write_date) VALUES ({id}, {company_id}, {dept_id}, {code}, {name}, {display_name}, {title}, {job}, {is_company}, {customer}, {supplier}, {parent_id}, {commercial_partner_id}, {user_id}, {country_id}, {region}, {zip}, {street}, {phone}, {mobile}, {fax}, {email}, {website}, {signup_type}, {signup_code}, {signup_expiration}, {tax_code}, {legal_person}, {register_fund}, {business_socpe}, {ref}, {brief}, {active}, {note}, {create_date}, {create_uid}, {write_uid}, {write_date})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO cm_partner (id, company_id, dept_id, code, name, display_name, title, job, is_company, customer, supplier, parent_id, commercial_partner_id, user_id, country_id, region, zip, street, phone, mobile, fax, email, website, signup_type, signup_code, signup_expiration, tax_code, legal_person, register_fund, business_socpe, ref, brief, active, note, create_date, create_uid, write_uid, write_date) VALUES ({#pk_uuid}, {company_id}, {dept_id}, {code}, {name}, {display_name}, {title}, {job}, {is_company}, {customer}, {supplier}, {parent_id}, {commercial_partner_id}, {user_id}, {country_id}, {region}, {zip}, {street}, {phone}, {mobile}, {fax}, {email}, {website}, {signup_type}, {signup_code}, {signup_expiration}, {tax_code}, {legal_person}, {register_fund}, {business_socpe}, {ref}, {brief}, {active}, {note}, {create_date}, {create_uid}, {write_uid}, {write_date})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_User(ID,Code,Account,NAME,Passwd,orgid,STATUS,DESCRIPTION) VALUES({#user.id},{code},{account},{name},{password},{orgid},{status},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO user (ID, NAME, PASSWORD) VALUES ({id}, {name}, {password})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO user (ID, NAME, PASSWORD) VALUES ({#user.code}, {name}, {password})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO cm_user_role_rel(USER_ID,ROLE_ID) VALUES({userid},{roleid})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO cm_dict (id, code, name, type, status, note) VALUES ({#pk_uuid}, {code}, {name}, {type}, {status}, {note})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO cm_dict_line (id, code, dict_id, dict_line_id, name, value, seq, path, layer, detail, status, note) VALUES ({#pk_uuid}, {code}, {dict_id}, {dict_line_id}, {name}, {value}, {seq:int}, {path}, {layer:int}, {detail}, {status}, {note})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_org(ID,Code,NAME,Shortfor,Org_Type,Higher_ID,Address,Tel,Fax,Zipcode,Status,DESCRIPTION) VALUES({#org.id},{code},{name},{shortfor},{org_type},{Higher_ID},{address},{tel},{fax},{zipcode},{status},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_MENU (ID,CODE,NAME,HIGHER_ID,SEQ,RESOURCE_ID,ICON_URI,HINT,Path,Layer,Detail,STATUS,DESCRIPTIOIN) VALUES ({#menu.id},{code},{name},{higher_id},{seq:int},{resource_id},{icon_uri},{hint},{path},{layer:int},{detail},{status},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_RESOURCE(ID,NAME,URI,TYPE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION) VALUES({id},{name},{uri},{type},{status},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_role(ID,CODE,NAME,Status,IS_EXT,DESCRIPTION) VALUES({#role.id},{code},{name},{status},{isext},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL(ROLE_ID,RESOURCE_ID) VALUES({roleid},{resourceid})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO CM_RESOURCE(ID,NAME,URI,TYPE,STATUS,DESCRIPTION) VALUES({id},{name},{uri},{type},{status},{desc})

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE cm_partner SET company_id = {company_id},dept_id = {dept_id}, code = {code}, name = {name},display_name = {display_name},title = {title}, job = {job},is_company = {is_company},customer = {customer},supplier = {supplier}, parent_id = {parent_id},commercial_partner_id = {commercial_partner_id},user_id = {user_id}, country_id = {country_id},region = {region},zip = {zip},street = {street},phone = {phone}, mobile = {mobile},fax = {fax},email = {email},website = {website},signup_type = {signup_type}, signup_code = {signup_code},signup_expiration = {signup_expiration},tax_code = {tax_code},legal_person = {legal_person}, register_fund = {register_fund},business_socpe = {business_socpe},ref = {ref},brief = {brief}, active = {active},note = {note},write_uid = {write_uid},write_date = {write_date} WHERE id = {id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mesg_recv SET mesg_recv_state = {mesg_recv_state} WHERE mesg_recv_msid = {mesg_recv_msid}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mesg_send SET mesg_send_state = {mesg_send_state} WHERE mesg_send_msid = {mesg_send_msid}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mesg_send SET mesg_recv_resta = {mesg_recv_resta},mesg_recv_time={mesg_recv_time},mesg_recv_rid={mesg_recv_rid} WHERE mesg_recv_uid = {mesg_recv_uid} AND mesg_send_msid ={mesg_send_msid}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE cm_compact SET Code = {code}, Name = {name}, partner_id = {partner_id}, product_code = {product_code}, product_name = {product_name}, product_qty = {product_qty}, product_uom = {product_uom}, Link_Man = {link_man}, telephone = {telephone}, Signed_Date = {signed_date}, Start_Date = {start_date}, End_Date = {end_date}, Description = {description} WHERE ID = {id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE cm_partner SET company_id = {company_id}, dept_id = {dept_id},code = {code}, name = {name},display_name = {display_name}, title = {title},job = {job},is_company = {is_company},customer = {customer},supplier = {supplier}, parent_id = {parent_id},commercial_partner_id = {commercial_partner_id}, user_id = {user_id},country_id = {country_id},region = {region},zip = {zip},street = {street},phone = {phone}, mobile = {mobile},fax = {fax},email = {email},website = {website},signup_type = {signup_type},signup_code = {signup_code}, signup_expiration = {signup_expiration},tax_code = {tax_code},legal_person = {legal_person},register_fund = {register_fund}, business_socpe = {business_socpe},ref = {ref},brief = {brief},active = {active},note = {note},write_uid = {write_uid},write_date = {write_date} WHERE id={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_USER SET Account={account},NAME={name},Orgid={orgid},STATUS={status},DESCRIPTION={description} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_USER SET passwd={pwd} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE cm_dict SET code = {code},name = {name},type = {type},status = {status},note = {note} WHERE id = {id}

property.name: sql
sql
property.value: UPDATE user SET NAME={name},PASSWORD={password} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_ORG SET code={code}, NAME={name},Shortfor={shortfor},org_type={org_type},Higher_ID={higher_id},Address={address},Tel={tel},Fax={fax},Zipcode={zipcode},STATUS={status},DESCRIPTION={description} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_MENU SET CODE ={code},NAME = {name},HIGHER_ID = {higher_id},SEQ = {seq},RESOURCE_ID = {resource_id},ICON_URI = {icon_uri},HINT = {hint},Path = {path},Layer = {layer},DETAIL={detail},STATUS = {status},DESCRIPTIOIN = {descriptioin} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_RESOURCE SET NAME={name},URI={uri},TYPE={type},STATUS={status},DESCRIPTION={description} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE CM_role SET CODE={code},NAME={name},STATUS={status},IS_EXT={is_ext},DESCRIPTION={description} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM user WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_DICT WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_DICT_LINE where ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_DICT_LINE WHERE DICT_ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_ORG WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_MENU WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_RESOURCE WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM CM_ROLE WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM CM_ROLE_RESOURCE_REL WHERE ROLE_ID={roleid} and RESOURCE_ID={resourceid}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM CM_RESOURCE WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM CM_USER WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM cm_user_role_rel WHERE USER_ID={userid} and ROLE_ID={roleid}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM Cm_Partner WHERE ID={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM Cm_Partner WHERE parent_id={id}

property.value: DELETE FROM Cm_Partner WHERE id={id}
